attributes.action: Give Fundraisers who collect funds on behalf of charities more recognition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We collect funds on behalf of The Royal British Legion. Because we are not a registered charity people are very reluctant to donate funds. Is there some other form of certification we can obtain to give us clearance to approach the general public, this is what is needed by ALL none-charity fundraisiers.
